title: Memory lingers on (Episode 4)
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Anatomy
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Body, Human
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Brain
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
description: Illustrates some of the latest research into the workings of the brain. Examines the memory capacity of the brain and probes such questions as "Does memory remain the same over the years?", "How does memory influence everyday actions", and "Is the script for the future already written - from memory?" Also gives details of how external stimuli are processed by the brain.
